title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 485.1 - Who must pay and how much
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 485.1 - Who must pay and how much

State Regulations

Each person required to obtain a permit or certificate
pursuant to the SPDES program must annually submit to the department a SPDES
program fee. The SPDES program fees are identified in section 72-0602 of the
ECL. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
485.1

Adopted

New

York State Register March 31, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 13, eff. 3/31/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
